H0.text: In Mexico, it is said that wearing what colour/color underwear on New Year's Eve ensures finding new love the following year. Pink

H1.text: In Mexico, it is said that wearing what colour/color underwear on New Year's Eve ensures finding new love the following year. Yellow

H2.text: In Mexico, it is said that wearing what colour/color underwear on New Year's Eve ensures finding new love the following year. Green

H3.text: In Mexico, it is said that wearing what colour/color underwear on New Year's Eve ensures finding new love the following year. Red
